task.summary: Default task
Fixes issues with bonus knacks losing their "combat" property and getting placed in the wrong spot in the knacks pane, and adds a confirmation when switching back from Play to Rest mode.
Cleanup of fonts which have been moved to shared resources to avoid unnecessary reloading, points links from data to new permalinks in manual, and improves trait description display.
Adds link to new homepage.
Fixes issues with descriptions repeating, introduced in previous commit.
We have editable feature descriptions across the board.
Upload and download characters.
We can print.
Cleans up menus. Ready for a new upload...
Removes trailing comma.
Only adds menu separator to _ekipMenu if any stored characters are present.
Renames Watch to Overwatch and adjusts the description to reflect the rule change in the Sourcebook.
Change in wording.
We have support for portraits.
Solves problem where transitioning back to splash leaves it sometimes zoomed all the way in to red.
Better mode switching.
Harmonizes chrome across assets.
Improvements to portrait and print.
Some improvements to print, plus clearer Task Resolver interface, which now displays target number to beat, automatic success, and inevitable failure.
Updates formula for calculating damage to match changes in Sourcebook, and fixes bug with combat after returning to base and entering Play mode again.
Better calculation and display of defence actions.
Fixes bug resolving defence reactions.
Switches to Flat theme, fixes a bug, and displays juju cost in add button.
Layout fixes.
Better combat toggle.
We have logic for rolling back character choices. UI is still fugly.
Cleans up UI.
Rollback works better. Relationship between stunts and combat training is retained.
Improvements to menus and save/load UI.
Adds the Genius trait.
Better handling of counts for allowed items. Shows them in pane title also. Not sure if all cases (remove, add) are properly handled though...
Keeps knacks pane hidden until traits have been selected. This makes things way easier as we don't need to worry about stuff like recalculating training cost if someone picks Genius after training.
Hides all other panes until traits have been selected.
Fixes formatting issues with Zonetouched trait.
Fixes problem with data leaking from one character to another when switching between them.
Fixes issue starting character creation over, and makes knacks immutable for saved characters.
Fixes bug which causes powers or ohun not to appear in control pane.
Tweaks to colours, and fixes layout issue with stats pane.
Better Resolver UI, also for combat.
Makes it possible to set defender's armour by clicking on the appropriate value in the inventory item.
Disables Ekip menu in Play mode since it won't work correctly anyway.
Disables Ekip menu in Play mode since it won't work correctly anyway.
Various minor tweaks.
Better information display for traits.
Cleans up some formatting issues in print and OOP view.
Tweaks inventory and fixes some print layout issues.
Refactor for client/server architecture. WIP...
Refactored server so everything is based on Deferreds.
Cleans up resp from where it's no longer needed.

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: Cleans up resp from where it's no longer needed.
